detectors.description:
Reentrancy in EtherStore.withdrawFunds(uint256) (shared/reentrancy/etherstore/etherstore_4round.sol#14-25):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender.call.value(_weiToWithdraw)()) (shared/reentrancy/etherstore/etherstore_4round.sol#21)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances[msg.sender] -= _weiToWithdraw (shared/reentrancy/etherstore/etherstore_4round.sol#22)
	EtherStore.balances (shared/reentrancy/etherstore/etherstore_4round.sol#7) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- EtherStore.balances (shared/reentrancy/etherstore/etherstore_4round.sol#7)
	- EtherStore.depositFunds() (shared/reentrancy/etherstore/etherstore_4round.sol#10-12)
	- EtherStore.withdrawFunds(uint256) (shared/reentrancy/etherstore/etherstore_4round.sol#14-25)
	- lastWithdrawTime[msg.sender] = now (shared/reentrancy/etherstore/etherstore_4round.sol#23)
	EtherStore.lastWithdrawTime (shared/reentrancy/etherstore/etherstore_4round.sol#6) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- EtherStore.lastWithdrawTime (shared/reentrancy/etherstore/etherstore_4round.sol#6)
	- EtherStore.withdrawFunds(uint256) (shared/reentrancy/etherstore/etherstore_4round.sol#14-25)
	- locked[msg.sender] = false (shared/reentrancy/etherstore/etherstore_4round.sol#24)
	EtherStore.locked (shared/reentrancy/etherstore/etherstore_4round.sol#8) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- EtherStore.withdrawFunds(uint256) (shared/reentrancy/etherstore/etherstore_4round.sol#14-25)

detectors.description:
EtherStore.withdrawFunds(uint256) (shared/reentrancy/etherstore/etherstore_4round.sol#14-25) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(now >= lastWithdrawTime[msg.sender] + 604800) (shared/reentrancy/etherstore/etherstore_4round.sol#18)
